waddington.kai.main.knnf.layers.neurons

Class NeuronOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • waddington.kai.main.knnf.layers.neurons.Neuron
      • waddington.kai.main.knnf.layers.neurons.NeuronOutput

  • public class NeuronOutput
extends Neuron
    This is the class for output-layer neurons. It extends the Neuron class.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double bias
      The bias value.
      private double biasDelta
      The delta for the bias.
      private int expectedOutput
      The expected classification for the current example.
      private org.jblas.DoubleMatrix weights
      A DoubleMatrix containing the weights for this neuron (excluding weight to bias value).

      • calculateDeltas

        public void calculateDeltas(java.util.List<Neuron> lowerNeurons,
                            java.util.List<Neuron> upperNeurons)
        Calculates the weight and bias deltas.
        Specified by:
        calculateDeltas in class Neuron
        Parameters:
        lowerNeurons - A list of neurons in the layer below.
        upperNeurons - A list of neurons in the layer above.

      • calculateOutput

        private void calculateOutput()
        Calculates the neurons output. This is an element-wise multiplication between the neurons weights and inputs.

      • getBias

        public double getBias()

      • getWeight

        public double getWeight(int index)
        Get a weight by its index.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the weight to retrieve.
        Returns:
        The value of the weight.

      • getWeights

        public org.jblas.DoubleMatrix getWeights()
        Get the weights for this neuron.
        Returns:
        The weights this neuron uses.

      • initWeights

        public void initWeights(int numberOfWeights)
        Initialises the values for the weights. The min/max values are dictated by NetworkManager.MaximumInitialWeights and are generated used NetworkManager.random.

      • setBias

        public void setBias(double b)

      • setExpectedOutput

        public double setExpectedOutput(int expectedOutput)
        Sets the expected classification output and also calculates the squared error of this neuron so that the MSE can be calculated. The output data at this point has already had the softmax function applied.
        Parameters:
        expectedOutput - The expected classification of the current example.
        Returns:
        The squared error of this neuron.

      • setInputData

        public void setInputData(org.jblas.DoubleMatrix data)
        Sets the input data for the neuron and triggers the neuron to calculate its output.
        Overrides:
        setInputData in class Neuron
        Parameters:
        data - A DoubleMatrix containing the input data.

      • setWeights

        public void setWeights(org.jblas.DoubleMatrix w)
        Sets the weights for this neuron to an already existing set of weights.
        Parameters:
        w - A DoubleMatrix containing the weights.
